Package edu.Minesweeper

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CellChange
    calculates the neighbours from the cell that is targedted
    Game
    starts game
    GameIsStillOn
    as long the user is not winning or loosing the game continues
    InputVerification
    verficicates the input, if its an input with M or T
    PlayGround
    creates playground and fills the mines into it
    UserInput
    Creates a new Scanner object for taking in, the UserInput
    ValidateUserInput
    validates the user input
